title: Back from Robothon with pics
content:
Robothon was well organized, heavily attended and a great deal of fun. My thanks to all of those involved and to the generosity, patience, and good taste of the many people involved.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157615075666184/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106070525/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157615075666184/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157615075666184/")
author: ebensorkin
